title: France : public debt 2017 to 2022
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of GDP. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
Overall Share of GDP has decreased over the Year.
Share of GDP is roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2022.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum Share of GDP, about 97.1 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Share of GDP, of value 91.4 was reported at Year 2022
